short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change your proxies with one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With our Chrome proxy addon, you can easily load your proxy list from the clipboard or a URL and switch between them with a single click.


Key Features:

Display the country for each proxy.Clear the cache before switching to a new proxy.
Automatically reload the current tab when changing proxies.
Rotate proxies automatically at intervals you specify.
Exclude certain URLs from using the proxy.
Block specific URLs from loading.


Note: Due to Chrome's limitations, it's not possible to set a different proxy for each tab. The proxy will be applied across the entire Chrome profile.
